title: Bisphosphonates increasingly prescribed to the women most likely to benefit

title_detail.value: Bisphosphonates increasingly prescribed to the women most likely to benefit

summary: In recent years, women who start taking bisphosphonates (BPs) to treat osteoporosis and prevent fracture have trended from younger to older and from having osteopenia to having osteoporosis, researchers report.

summary_detail.value: In recent years, women who start taking bisphosphonates (BPs) to treat osteoporosis and prevent fracture have trended from younger to older and from having osteopenia to having osteoporosis, researchers report.
